question: Hi guys new here, me and my partner have now decided to try properly to have a child I'm currently on liraglutude for my diabetes as my sugar levels where fairly bad because metformin wasn't working for me I've now had pretty good levels since starting this end of January, we've been having intercourse every 48 to 72 hours like many people/sites have recommends but we don't  seem to be having much luck, also wondering if it's due to fertility problems as we have often unprotected sex for the last 6 years?!
title: Help ttc
